fields.fieldDescription: This is the unique identifier of the row.
This is the unique identifier of the associated Banking Product Definition.
This is the unique identifier used externally, if any, of the product-level definition.If there is no external id , it will be set to PDA_RID_BKG_PRD_AS.
This is the unique identifier of the product with which this row is associated.
This is a code representing the type of the owner.
This is the date that the applicability of the banking product to the owner was approved.
This is represents the current status of the Loan IQ product specifically with respect to the banking product.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
